topic.title: how to add images in 0-Gallery
topic.body: I would like to add pictures in 0-Gallery, but I do not understand how to do

topic.title: Two hub on ZeroMe
topic.body:
Hello,

On ZeroMe I changed hubs and I would like to know how to remove the data on the old hub.

1554629989_1KAfaybmXBh916cDwXjd4gaE7Scnw.body:
> [leftside](#comment_714_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): Browser every site all over the zeronet and collect most active users' user names. [...]

ok thx @leftside

> [leftside](#comment_715_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): Yes, I got notification in the front page that you mentioned my name. Now I'm here to reply.  [...]

thanks for your help. ZeroNet is wonderful

@leftside 
messages are deleted after a while?

@anonymouslogin 
ah so when I reached the limit I delete old message

> [caryoscelus](#comment_112_13oRBYqNeUr6Tvgt4KkAT9FT4XRiKFBjnE): Nah, the usual way is to just ask admin (in case of zerotalk it's nofish) to extend your limit [...]

thx ^^

1554657289_1KAfaybmXBh916cDwXjd4gaE7Scnw.body: @ssdifnskdjfnsdjk  yep picture come from hub i need to make my hub its right ?
there is not a site with the doc for api, if I want to encode a site with an optional folder system containing images ?

@sirlotaplot  
how did you guess I wanted to do nsfw xD? thank you for the info I'll think about that

> [sirlotaplot](#comment_2_18UukzxVzEwd9ugyvKWYe2vud77GyL72Px)
I can have the NSFW blog link ?
@1pgallery hubs can be use on zerome + 1+Gallery with same Zite or not ?

@1pgallery
i got an error when add picture

```
main.js:16 Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: Cannot read property 'split' of undefined
    at main.js:16

  s.default.uploadFile(h, e._v.split(",")[1], !1, function(t) {
```

but i change manifest.json for add manualy picture and that work
@1pgallery we need to do something to upgrade hub ?
@1pgallery ok thx =) for my other question about ZeroMe hub its possible ?
@1pgallery ok. thx to u, my hub is online =)

1538188815_1NcVwrBpf91ownXuSgYnHBZCWjoiN.body: @1pgallery oh thx for the link and yes i do this `did you sign the galleries + list? It's the blue buttons on the hub page.`

> [dracks](#comment_23_1KAfaybmXBh916cDwXjd4gaE7ScnwfiYcR): @1pgallery oh ok i make this

/galleries/ and /galleries/*/ ?

> [1pgallery](#comment_51_1GDcCK6cWoj98mg541Yj9rW1nwXcBz87eE): Check is the file /galleries/content.json now there?if it still isn't just create it and paste this, then sign it. [...]

need to click on : Sign & Publish List The gallery list should be signe... ?

> [1pgallery](#comment_53_1GDcCK6cWoj98mg541Yj9rW1nwXcBz87eE): Everything should be signed. /content.json is for the zite itself. /galleries/content.json is the list of galleries and each gallery has to be signed individually (but there's a button to sign them all in one go). [...]

done
@1pgallery in comment when i submit one i see 3 : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1EYrmjvLrmAzkczAhBp76trvdfuR2WXK9f/SFW%20-%20Cute
@1pgallery no its ok, thank for help
@1pgallery ok fine =) its 2:52 here i go sleep =)
